'''1.19.22''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on September 1, 2022,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/8770372777229|title=Minecraft - 1.19.22 (Bedrock)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=September 1, 2022}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash that could occur on some devices when loading in worlds with texture packs applied ({{bug|MCPE-160800}}).
* Fixed a bug where deleting cloud synced worlds on Xbox would not delete the cloud version of the world when the player deleted the world locally.
* Fixed an issue on Xbox that could cause players to see a “storage full” error despite having plenty of storage.
